title: Mrs. Sigg's Snickerdoodles
method: Step 2: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Step 3: Make cookies: Beat sugar, butter, shortening, eggs, and vanilla in a large bowl until smooth and creamy.
Step 4: Whisk flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl. Gradually mix dry ingredients mixture into the wet ingredients just until combined.
Step 5: Shape dough into walnut-sized balls.
Step 6: Make cinnamon-sugar: Combine sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl or zip-top plastic bag.
Step 7: Place dough balls in cinnamon-sugar and roll or shake until coated. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets.
Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven until set but not too hard, 8 to 10 minutes, switching racks halfway through.
Step 9: Remove from the oven and immediately transfer to wire racks to cool.
